price: Na nini kitakujuulisha nini hilo Tukio la haki?
footnotes: Na kitu gani kitacho kujuvya ukweli wake, na kitacho kupa sura ya kitisho chake na shida zake?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
